title: Digital Microlearning with Accounting Visualization: Optimized for ESL Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental accounting concepts and basic operation of digital devices
context.additional_context: Beginner accounting training course for current professionals. Designed with a focus on visual materials to minimize cognitive load for non-native English learners.

learning_goals: Accurately identify financial statement components (assets/liabilities/equity) in MDLOs visual materials by over 80%
Apply information visualization principles (signal-to-noise ratio, split-attention effect) based on CLT theory to actual accounting cases
Achieve 90% accuracy in calculating cost of goods sold using interactive graphs/animations in mobile environments

resources: Customizable MDLOs (Multimedia Digital Learning Objects) library

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
